review: I have got my RCT done by Dr Ravi and I am completely satisfied with his work ethics and treatment. Would recommend this clinic for all your dental problems.
It was a very good dental experience with Dr.  Ravi Dahiya.  He understood my concerns and was very polite with me. I would like to visit him again in future.

I am thankful to you  sir for  excellent pain-free dental treatment (R.C.T ). You are very honest towards your profession ,moreover very humble  and kind . I would highly recommend  Dr.Ravi Dahiya for all dental problems to all.. I was always scared of RCT  but my experience got completely changed when I got R.C.T from Ravi sir.A millions thanks to u  Sir . *** **** ******* *****

I have been visiting Dr. Ravi from past couple of years. I have no doubts that he is an expert dentist, but his expertise also lies in making his patients comfortable during the painful dental procedures. I also take my son to him for a dental check up and scaling once in six months. I am proud to say that Answer to all of my family's dental issues is Dr. Ravi Dhayia at Family Dental
